ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Gaston P. Jorré ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. GASTON P. JORRÉ, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective October 1, 2017.
